idea:
AI is a priority for all the business executives for transforming customer experience, improving efficiencies across processes, mitigating risks, enhancing team and partner engagements. There is a wide variety of use cases where AI augments the intelligence to improve strategic decision making, competitive positioning and business operations like never before.

Our AI advisory services can help you drive this AI-led transformation, accelerate its adoption and maximize returns on its investments. We have helped leading organizations establish enterprise-wide AI & Data strategy. Our clients benefit from the deep domain knowledge of our consultants, proprietary accelerators and pre-built solution frameworks.
name: EXPONENTIA.AI PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
WELCOME TO BUCKBAK We provide big data analytics Techniques & Data Solutions BuckBak is a disruptive branding platform which focuses extensively on machine learning and social media analytics for brand building and related exercises.


                                            What We Do! 


 1) Data Science - The Data Analyst The Data Engineer Machine Learning

     Data Generalist.


2) Artificial Intelligence - Reactive Machines, Limited Memory, Theory of                   Mind,Artificial Narrow Intelligence.


3) Machine Learning- Linear Regression Support Vector Machines Random             Forest Ensemble Methods.
name: BRMODAK ANALYTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
In our country majority of students depend on their parents after and during their education for expenses. It gets more difficult for those who are self- financing their education.


So overcome this problem we have developed a platform so that students who have age of 18+ can register and get there desired job so that they can manage there expenses by there own.
name: EKEMAYA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Lazy Bone Innovations is a company that publishes the e-learning application named “Quill – The Padhai App”. Quill App was launched at a time when the country was going through a lockdown and students had no access to physical books.

idea:
To carry on in India and abroad the business of distributors, transporter, traders, retailers, marketing and suppliers by creating online link

with the customer, to advertise and promote the business online for distribution of petrol, diesel, Light diesel, High speed diesel, LPG,

Engine Oil, CNG, CBG, LNG and other related products with the help of an ecommerce website and/or mobile applications and to ensure

maintenance of continuous and smooth supplies of petroleum products by way of reselling and transportation and to further enhance

marketing infrastructure and reseller network for providing assured service to customers throughout the country and to do all such act

which is necessary to attainment of the main object.
name: LYNX ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED
